DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of days for additional infusion(s).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Added; extra; further._Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
